label: ProductInstance
comment: An individual trade product or batch of similar trade products produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.

datatypeProperties.comment: A batch identifier for this trade product.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value before which it is best to consume the items contained in this trade product instance.
The ceramic capacitor identifier of this trade product instance.
The DNA marker identifier of this product batch.
The EPC (Electronic Product Code) identifier of this trade product instance.
An expiry date, time, date time or other date time value for this specified licence.
The unique global serial identifier for this trade product instance.
The unique kanban identifier for this trade product instance.
The unique lot identifier for this trade product instance.
The unique manufacturer assigned serial identifier for this trade product instance.
A unique registration identifier, such as a vehicle licence plate identification, for this trade product instance.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value by after which the items contained in the trade product instance should not be sold.
A unique serial identifier for this trade product instance.
The unique supplier assigned serial identifier for this trade product instance.

objectProperties.comment: The actual quantity added or subtracted as a result of this delivery adjustment.
A distinguishing material feature applicable to this trade product instance.
A characteristic applicable to this trade product.
A product handling process applied to this supply chain trade line item, such as manufacturing, treatment or storage.
A supply chain inspection event at this logistics location.
A location of origin for this supply chain product instance.
The packaging event for this trade product instance.
The production event for this trade product instance.

referencedBy.comment: An individual instance of this trade product.
